q: Google( NASDAQ: GOOG) said Eric Schmidt will continue to act as an internal advisor to Larry Page and Sergey Brin , but will devote his attention to other areas, including deals, partnerships and government relations. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited

Angelina Jolie 's statement provided by Adam Waldman of Washington's Endeavor Group reads: Earlier this week, the Daily Mirror U.K. and others reported that Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt are in the process of adopting a child from Haiti. Rather, Ms. Angelina Jolie is focused on enhancing the welfare and legal protection of children within Haiti. As such, she has been meeting with government of Haiti officials, Haitian legal experts and non-governmental organizations regarding a new initiative of the Brad Pitt Foundation. The recently launched Angelina Jolie Legal Fellows Program will assist the justice system in Haiti to improve child protection. Angelina Jolie never even met the Haitian girl named Leah, according to Waldman.
